title: Taylor_Swift_Bad_Blood_0

Follow procedure, remember? Oh, wait, you got amnesia
It was my season for battle wounds, battle scars, body bumped, bruised
Stabbed in the back; brimstone, fire jumping through
Still, love my life, I got money and power
And you gotta live with the bad blood now

Oh, it's so sad to
Think about the good times
You and I

If you live like that, you live with ghosts, mm (Uh, uh)

Sećaš li se kada si probala da me otpišeš?

Zar se ne sećaš? Mislila si da ćeš mi biti potrebna

A, dakle, imaš amneziju?
Bio je to period rana iz ratova, ožiljaka iz borbe, izubijanog i modrog tela
Zabadanja noža u leđa; otrova i preskakanja vatre
Ipak, čitav život imam pare i moć
A ti moraš da živiš sa tom mržnjom sada

Tako je tužno
